content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia Müller. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment in Magdeburg, let us focus solely on discussing the rental price at this moment. To begin negotiations, I propose a price of 950 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the initial price offer. After considering my financial situation and desire to secure this ideal apartment in an optimal location, I would like to try lowering the price. I propose negotiating around 875 Euros monthly.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my primary goal is to achieve the highest possible rental price for this apartment. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
